death.attack.create.fan_fire: %1$s was burned to death by hot air
death.attack.create.fan_lava: %1$s was burned to death by lava fan
death.attack.create.curse_polish: %1$s tried to polish a cursed item
create.gui.blockzapper.title: Handheld Blockzapper
create.blockzapper.leftClickToSet: Left-Click a Block to set Material
create.gui.flexcrate.title: Adjustable Crate
create.gui.stockswitch.title: Stockpile Switch
create.schematicAndQuill.prompt: Enter a name for the Schematic:
create.schematic.invalid: [!] Invalid Item - Use the Schematic Table instead
create.schematic.tool.deploy.description: Moves the structure to a location.
Right-Click on the ground to place.
Hold [Ctrl] to select at a fixed distance.
create.schematic.tool.move.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to push it.
create.schematic.tool.rotate.description: Rotates the Schematic around its center.
Instantly places the structure in the world
[Right-Click] to confirm placement at the current location.
This tool is for Creative Mode only.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.0: Flips the Schematic along the face you select.
create.schematic.tool.flip.description.1: Point at the Schematic and [CTRL]-Scroll to flip it.
create.schematics.maxAllowedSize: The maximum allowed schematic file size is:
create.gui.schematicTable.title: Schematic Table
create.gui.schematicannon.title: Schematicannon
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipMis: If the Schematicannon cannot find a required Block for placement, it will continue at the next Location.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.skipTil: The Schematicannon will avoid replacing data holding blocks such as Chests.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.dontRep: The cannon will never replace any Solid blocks in its working area, only non-Solid and Air.
create.gui.schematicannon.option.replace: The cannon will only replace Solid blocks in its working area, if the Schematic contains a solid Block at their location.
The cannon will replace Solid blocks in its working area, if the Schematic contains any Block at their location.
The cannon will clear out all blocks in its working area, including those replaced by Air.
create.gui.index.title: Logistical Index
create.gui.filter.blacklist.description: Items pass if they do NOT match any of the above. An empty Blacklist accepts everything.
create.gui.filter.whitelist.description: Items pass if they match any of the above. An empty Whitelist rejects anything.
create.gui.filter.respect_data.descripti: Items only match if their durability, enchantments and other attributes match as well.
create.gui.filter.ignore_data.descriptio: Items match regardless of their attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.whitelist_di: Items pass if they have at least one of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.whitelist_co: Items pass only if they have ALL of the selected attributes.
create.gui.attribute_filter.blacklist.de: Items pass if they do NOT have any of the selected attributes.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription0: Please keep this item away from children.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription1: A baby panda dies everytime you use this item.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription3: Nothing to see here, please disperse.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription4: This item will self-destruct in 10 seconds.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription6: By using this item, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription7: This one maybe isn't for you.
create.tooltip.randomWipDescription8: Use it and regret your decision immediately.
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.slo: [Create]: Server tick is currently slowed by %s ms
[Create]: Server tick is slowed by %s ms now :)
[Create]: Server tick is back to regular speed
create.command.killTPSCommand.status.usa: [Create]: use /killtps stop to bring back server tick to regular speed
[Create]: use /killtps start <tickTime> to artificially slow down the server tick
item.create.example_item.tooltip: EXAMPLE ITEM (just a marker that this tooltip exists)
item.create.example_item.tooltip.summary: A brief description of the item. _Underscores_ highlight a term.
item.create.example_item.tooltip.behavio: Then this item does this. (behaviours show on shift)
You can add as many behaviours as you like
item.create.symmetry_wand.tooltip.summar: Perfectly mirrors your Block placement across the configured planes.
item.create.placement_handgun.tooltip.su: Novel gadget for placing or exchanging blocks at a distance.
item.create.placement_handgun.tooltip.ac: Sets blocks placed by the tool to the targeted block.
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.summ: A powerful combination of minerals suitable for common tree types
item.create.tree_fertilizer.tooltip.beha: Grows Trees regardless of their spacing Conditions
item.create.filter.tooltip.summary: _Controls_ _outputs_ and inputs of logistical devices with more _precision,_ matching them against a _set_ _of_ _items_ or several _nested_ _filters._
item.create.property_filter.tooltip.summ: _Controls_ _outputs_ and inputs of logistical devices with more _precision,_ matching them against a _set_ _of_ item _attributes_ and _categories._
block.create.cocoa_log.tooltip.summary: An augmented jungle log allowing for easier automation of _Cocoa_ _Beans_
item.create.empty_blueprint.tooltip.summ: Used as a recipe ingredient and for writing at the _Schematic_ _Table_
item.create.blueprint.tooltip.summary: Holds a structure to be positioned and placed into the world. Position the Hologram as desired and use a _Schematicannon_ to build it.
item.create.blueprint.tooltip.behaviour1: Can be positioned using the Tools on Screen
Used for saving a Structure in your world to a .nbt file.
Select two corner points using R-Click
_Ctrl-Scroll_ on the faces to adjust the size. R-Click again to Save.
Select a corner point / confirm save
Select points in _mid-air_. _Scroll_ to adjust the distance.
block.create.creative_crate.tooltip.summ: Provides an endless supply of blocks to adjacent _Schematicannons_
block.create.schematicannon.tooltip.summ: Shoots blocks to recreate a deployed _Schematic_ in the World. Uses items from adjacent Inventories and _Gunpowder_ as fuel.
block.create.schematic_table.tooltip.beh: Uploads a chosen File from your Schematics Folder
block.create.cogwheel.tooltip.summary: _Relays_ _Rotation_ in a straigt line, and to adjacent _Cogwheels._
block.create.large_cogwheel.tooltip.summ: A larger version of the _Cogwheel,_ allowing for _change_ in _Rotation_ _Speed_ when connected to its smaller Counterpart.
block.create.encased_shaft.tooltip.summa: _Relays_ _Rotation_ in a straight line. Suitable for propagating Rotation through Walls.
block.create.clutch.tooltip.behaviour1: _Stops_ conveying rotation to the other side.
block.create.encased_belt.tooltip.summar: _Relays_ _Rotation_ through its block and to attached _Encased_ _Belts._
block.create.encased_belt.tooltip.behavi: Attached Blocks will have the exact _same_ _rotation_ _speed_ and direction. They do not have to face the same way.
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.summa: Connects two _Shafts_ with a _Mechanical_ _Belt._ Connected shafts will have the exact same rotation speed and direction. The Belt can act as a _Conveyor_ for _Entities._
item.create.belt_connector.tooltip.actio: Selects the shaft as one pulley of the Belt. Both selected Shafts have to _line_ _up_ either _Vertically,_ _Horizontally_ or _Diagonally_ towards the Belt's Direction.
_Resets_ the first selected position for the Belt
item.create.goggles.tooltip.summary: A pair of glasses to augment your vision with useful _kinetic_ _information._
item.create.goggles.tooltip.behaviour1: Shows _colored_ _indicators_ corresponding to the _Speed_ _Level_ of a placed kinetic component.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.summary: Converts _Rotational_ _Force_ to _Air_ _Currents_ and back. Has a variety of uses.
block.create.encased_fan.tooltip.behavio: Provides _rotational_ _force_ from any _heat_ _sources_ immediately below itself. The fan has to be facing down.
_Pushes_ or _Pulls_ Entities, depending on the incoming Rotation speed.
_Liquids_ and _Fire_ emit particles into the air flow. This can be used to _process_ _items._
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.summ: Large rotatable wheels that _break_ _down_ anything stopping their motion.
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.cond: When attached to other Crushing Wheel
block.create.crushing_wheel.tooltip.beha: Forms a crushing setup for processing a variety of things. The Wheels' teeth have to connect and moving with the _same_ _speed_ in _opposite_ _directions._
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.su: A forceful piston for compressing items beneath it. Requires constant _Rotational_ _Force._
block.create.mechanical_press.tooltip.be: _Starts_ to compress items dropped below it.
_Automatically_ compresses bypassing items on the Belt.
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.su: A kinetic whisk for applying any shapeless crafting recipes to items beneath it. Requires constant _Rotational_ _Force_ and a _Basin_ placed below (with a gap inbetween).
block.create.mechanical_mixer.tooltip.be: Starts to mix items in the basin whenever all necessary ingredients are present.
_Configures_ the minimum amount of _total_ _ingredients_ for applied recipes. Use this option to _rule_ _out_ _unwanted_ _recipes_ with similar but less ingredients.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.s: A more advanced version of the _Piston,_ using _Rotational_ _Force_ to precisely move attached structures. _Piston_ _Extension_ _Poles_ at the rear define the _Range_ of this Device. Without extensions, the piston will not move. Use _Translation_ _Chassis_ to move more than a single line of blocks.
block.create.mechanical_piston.tooltip.b: Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to the incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.sticky_mechanical_piston.to: A more advanced version of the _Sticky_ _Piston,_ using _Rotational_ _Force_ to precisely move attached structures. _Piston_ _Extension_ _Poles_ at the rear define the _Range_ of this Device. Without extensions, the piston will not move. Use _Translation_ _Chassis_ to move more than a single line of blocks.
Starts moving the attached structure. Speed and direction correlate to the incoming Rotation Speed.
block.create.piston_pole.tooltip.summary: Used to increase the extension range of _Mechanical_ _Pistons_
block.create.piston_pole.tooltip.behavio: Extends the pistons extension range by 1 block
Used for rotating _larger_ _structures_ or generating _Rotational_ _Force_ from wind.
Starts physically rotating attached _Rotation_ _Chassis_ and their attached blocks respectively.
Starts providing _Rotational_ _Force_ from rotating its attached structure. The Structure has to include suitable _Sail_ _Blocks_ (Currently any Wool Block).
block.create.translation_chassis.tooltip: A configurable base for Structures moved by a _Mechanical_ _Piston._ These Blocks have to form the first Layer of blocks in front of the Piston.
_Moves_ all _attached_ _Chassis_ with the same orientation, and attached Blocks in front of it. When the Piston retracts, blocks will only be pulled if the chassis' face is _Sticky_ (See [Ctrl]).
Makes the clicked face _Sticky._ When the piston retracts, the chassis will _pull_ _back_ all attached Blocks in its column and within the configured Range.
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.su: Required for rotating structures with the _Mechanical_ _Bearing._
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.be: _Rotates_ all blocks attached to _Sticky_ sides (See [Ctrl]) within the configured range around itself. _Transmits_ the rotation to further attached Rotation Chassis.
block.create.rotation_chassis.tooltip.ac: Makes the clicked face _Sticky._ When the Chassis rotates, all blocks attached to this side will be rotated with it.
block.create.drill.tooltip.behaviour1: Acts as a _stationary_ Block Breaker. Also _hurts_ _entities_ in its effective area.
block.create.drill.tooltip.behaviour2: Breaks Blocks the drill is running into.
block.create.harvester.tooltip.summary: A mechanical plant cutter suitable for medium scale crop automation
block.create.harvester.tooltip.behaviour: _Harvests_ all _mature_ _crops_ the blade is running into, and resets them to their initial growth state.
block.create.stockswitch.tooltip.summary: Toggles a Redstone signal based on the _Storage_ _Space_ in the attached Container.
block.create.stockswitch.tooltip.behavio: Starts providing _Redstone_ _Power_ until Lower Limit is reached again.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.sum: Endpoints for _Wireless_ _Redstone_ connections. Can be assigned _Frequencies_ using any item. Signal range is limited, but reasonably far.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.beh: Receiving Links of the same _Frequency_ will provide a Redstone signal.
block.create.redstone_bridge.tooltip.act: Sets the _Frequency_ to that item. A total of _two_ _different_ _items_ can be used in combination for defining a Frequency.
block.create.contact.tooltip.summary: A simple device for advanced Redstone Contraptions.
block.create.contact.tooltip.behaviour2: Triggers all stationary Contacts passing by
block.create.flexcrate.tooltip.summary: This _Storage_ _Container_ allows Manual control over its capacity. It can hold up to _16_ _Stacks_ of any Item
block.create.extractor.tooltip.summary: _Takes_ _items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and drops them onto the ground. Will not drop Items until the space cleared. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter._
block.create.extractor.tooltip.action1: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter._ Extractor will pull the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack exclusively.
block.create.linked_extractor.tooltip.su: _Takes_ _items_ from an attached _Inventory_ and drops them onto the ground. Will not drop Items until the space cleared. Can be assigned an item-stack as a _filter._ Can be controlled remotely via a _Redstone_ _Link._
block.create.linked_extractor.tooltip.ac: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter._ Extractor will pull the item _type_ and _count_ of the filter stack exclusively.
Assigns currently _held_ _item_ as part of the Frequency listened on. Whenever a transmitting _Redstone_ _Link_ of the same frequency is powered, this Extractor will pause.
block.create.belt_funnel.tooltip.summary: Collects incoming items on a _Mechanical_ _Belt_ and inserts them into the attached _Inventory_ if possible. Has to be directly _on_ _top_ of a Belt, with the opening facing against the Belts' movement direction. The inventory has to be on the same height as the funnel.
block.create.entity_detector.tooltip.sum: Detects items passing by on a _Mechanical_ _Belt_ in front of it. Works well with a _Piston_ on top, pushing certain items off.
block.create.entity_detector.tooltip.beh: Provides a short _Redstone_ _pulse_ to all sides. An Empty Filter matches all passing items.
block.create.entity_detector.tooltip.act: Assigns currently _held_ _stack_ as the _Filter._ Observer will react to this item type only.
block.create.pulse_repeater.tooltip.summ: A simple circuit for cutting passing redstone signals to a length of _1_ _tick._
block.create.flexpeater.tooltip.summary: An advanced _Redstone_ _Repeater_ with a _configurable_ _Delay_ up to 30 Minutes.
block.create.speed_gauge.tooltip.summary: Measures and displays the _rotational_ _speed_ of attached kinetic components.
block.create.speed_gauge.tooltip.behavio: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of speed. _Green_ indicates Slow, _Blue_ moderate and _Purple_ fast rotation. Some mechanical components require a sufficient level of speed to work properly.
block.create.stress_gauge.tooltip.summar: Measures and displays the _overall_ _stress_ of the attached kinetic network.
block.create.stress_gauge.tooltip.behavi: Indicates a color corresponding to the level of stress. _Over-stressed_ _networks_ will cease to move. Stress can be relieved by adding more _rotational_ _sources_ to the network.
